identity.mission: Create a futuristic, 'Control Room' aesthetic for LittleHelper AI that feels like a high-end developer tool from 2077.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix IDE utility with Cyberpunk aesthetics.
Emotion First: Every interaction should feel 'powerful' and 'electric'.
Content is King: The code and agents are the heroes.
Negative Space: Use deep black voids to make neon pop.
Contrast: High contrast text for readability in dark mode.

headings.usage: Landing page titles, Feature headers, Modal titles

code.usage: Code editor, Terminal, File tree, Agent logs

grids.landing: Mode A: The Tetris Grid (Asymmetrical, Art-focused)
grids.app: Mode B: The Control Room Grid (Dense, Data-focused, 100% height)

buttons.style: Sharp edges or slight rounded-md. Primary buttons must have a 'glow' effect.

cards.style: Glassmorphism. Dark, translucent, with a subtle white border.

inputs.style: Minimalist, dark background, neon focus ring.

navigation.classes: sticky top-0 z-50 w-full border-b border-white/10 bg-black/50 backdrop-blur-xl supports-[backdrop-filter]:bg-black/20

effects: Neon Glows: Use drop-shadow or box-shadow to create light bleed around active elements.
Scanlines: Optional subtle overlay for that 'retro-future' terminal feel.
Particles: Use tsparticles for the hero background (network nodes).

workspace_showcase.usage: Social proof or 'How it works' section

icons.style: Thin strokes (1.5px), colored with gradient fills if possible, or neon colors.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a high-performance AI IDE. The UI must feel 'fast' and 'intelligent'. Avoid generic SaaS layouts.
instructions_to_main_agent.landing_page: Use the 'Tetris Grid'. The Hero section should be immersive with the 'agent_network' image or particles. Show the 7 agents as 'cards' with distinct neon colors.
instructions_to_main_agent.dashboard: Use the 'Control Room Grid'. Dense, information-rich. Use the 'JetBrains Mono' font for all data and code.
instructions_to_main_agent.ide: The core experience. 3-column layout (File Tree, Editor, Chat/Terminal). Darkest background for the editor area to reduce eye strain. Use 'Glassmorphism' for the panels.
instructions_to_main_agent.auth: Simple, centered, glass card on top of the 'hero_bg' image.
universal_rules: NO gradients on text unless it's a very large headline.
NO pure black (#000000) backgrounds; use #030712 or similar.
